product_name: Marmot Trail Breeze 3/4 Tights - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Marmot Trail Breeze 3/4 Tights let you run or climb with freedom-loving stretch. Lightweight performance fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly to help keep you cool and comfortable. Mesh panels behind knees enhance breathability. Fabric helps protects skin from too much sunlight with a UPF factor of 30. Gusset features a quick-drying, highly breathable Coolmax(R) polyester fabric patch. Bonded back pocket with zippered closure stashes small workout essentials. Reflective highlights increase visibility in dim light. The women's Marmot Trail Breeze 3/4 Tights feature a 17 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Marmot Trail Breeze 3/4 Tights let you run or climb with freedom-loving stretch. Lightweight performance fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly to help keep you cool and comfortable.
